title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Rise of AI-powered Voice Communications in Financial Services (AIM263)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融服务中AI驱动语音通信的兴起 (AIM263)
abstract: Financial Services has been at the forefront of speech and self service technologies for many decades. Yet it remains challenging to keep up with increasing business demands for digital automation while expanding customer value and relevance. Amazon Nova Sonic provides a new level of AI efficiency with its sophisticated speech-to-speech and flexible knowledge base architecture, built on powerful AI foundational models. This talk explores new use cases in banking, mortgage, and wealth management with Vonage’s integration of Nova Sonic AI Agents into contact center self-service, mobile apps, web experiences, video sessions, and API-powered CX of all kinds. This presentation is brought to you by Vonage, Part of Ericsson, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 金融服务业在语音和自助服务技术方面已处于前沿地位数十年。然而，在扩大客户价值和相关性的同时跟上不断增长的数字化自动化业务需求仍然具有挑战性。Amazon Nova Sonic凭借其先进的语音到语音技术和灵活的知识库架构，基于强大的AI基础模型，提供了全新水平的AI效率。本次演讲探讨了银行、抵押贷款和财富管理领域的新用例，展示了Vonage将Nova Sonic AI代理集成到联络中心自助服务、移动应用、网络体验、视频会话以及各种API驱动的客户体验中。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Vonage（爱立信旗下）为您呈现。

presenter.name: Christophe Van de Weyer
presenter.title: President and Head of Business Unit API
